CustomField.formula: CASE(DMAPP__Status__c, "Mentor", 2.1, "Enemy", 2.2, "Supporter", 1.1, "Non-Supporter", 1.2, "Neutral", 0, "Unknown", 0, 0) + CASE(DMAPP__Political__c, "Inner Circle", 2, "Political Structure", 1, "Unknown", 0, "Outside Political Structure", 0, 0) + CASE(DMAPP__Key_Buyer_Role__c, "decision maker", 2, "approver", 2, "evaluator", 1, "user", 0, "other", 0, 0)
CustomField.label: Absolute Weight
